3.caption_en:

5.caption_en:
Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking — an orange slide (01) that frames the topic with three guiding questions about why ecosystem thinking matters, key trends driving ecosystem-based business models, and the three levels needed to unlock long-term growth. 

{"artifact_type":"slide","slide_number":"01","title":"Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking","background_color":"orange","text_color":"white","body_text":["Why is ecosystem thinking important today?","What are the major trends we see leading to the dominance of ecosystem based business models?","What are the 3 levels of ecosystem thinking you need to understand and apply to unlock new growth for your business in the longterm"],"layout":{"title_position":"center-left","number_position":"top-left","body_alignment":"left","title_font_weight":"bold","body_font_weight":"regular"},"notes":"Introductory slide presented as questions to guide a discussion on ecosystem-based business models and strategic growth."}
